author: odoo
code:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-


{
    'name': 'France - VAT Anti-Fraud Certification (CGI 286 I-3 bis) - Sale Closings',
    'version': '1.0',
    'category': 'Localization',
    'description': """
This module adds support for automatic sales closings with computation of both period and cumulative totals (daily, monthly, annually)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The module adds following features:

    Storage: automatic sales closings with computation of both period and cumulative totals (daily, monthly, annually)

""",
    'depends': ['l10n_fr_certification'],
    'installable': True,
    'auto_install': True,
    'application': False,
    'data': [
        'views/account_sale_closure.xml',
        'data/account_sale_closure_cron.xml',
        'security/ir.model.access.csv',
        'security/account_closing_intercompany.xml',
    ],
    'post_init_hook': '_setup_inalterability',
}
comments: this module adds support automatic sales closings computation period cumulative totals (daily  monthly  annually)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the module adds following features       storage  automatic sales closings computation period cumulative totals (daily  monthly  annually)             coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details

{
    'name': 'France - VAT Anti-Fraud Certification (CGI 286 I-3 bis) - Sale Closings',
    'version': '1.0',
    'category': 'Localization',
    'description': """
This module adds support for automatic sales closings with computation of both period and cumulative totals (daily, monthly, annually)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The module adds following features:

    Storage: automatic sales closings with computation of both period and cumulative totals (daily, monthly, annually)

""",
    'depends': ['l10n_fr_certification'],
    'installable': True,
    'auto_install': True,
    'application': False,
    'data': [
        'views/account_sale_closure.xml',
        'data/account_sale_closure_cron.xml',
        'security/ir.model.access.csv',
        'security/account_closing_intercompany.xml',
    ],
    'post_init_hook': '_setup_inalterability',
}
